sn35.132:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati makkarakate araññakuṭikāyaṃ.
sn35.132:4.2: Atha kho lohiccassa brāhmaṇassa sambahulā antevāsikā kaṭṭhahārakā māṇavakā yenāyasmato mahākaccānassa araññakuṭikā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn35.132:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā parito parito kuṭikāya anucaṅkamanti anuvicaranti uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kānici kānici seleyyakāni karonti:
sn35.132:4.4: “ime pana muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kaṇhā bandhupādāpaccā, imesaṃ bharatakānaṃ sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā apacitā”ti.
sn35.132:4.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahākaccāno vihārā nikkhamitvā te māṇavake etadavoca:
sn35.132:4.8: Evaṃ vutte, te māṇavakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn35.132:4.9: Atha kho āyasmā mahākaccāno te māṇavake gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
sn35.132:6.1: Dhamme ca jhāne ca ratā ahesuṃ,
sn35.132:7.3: Kodhābhibhūtā puthuattadaṇḍā,
sn35.132:11.1: Atha kho te māṇavakā kupitā anattamanā yena lohicco brāhmaṇo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn35.132:11.3: “yagghe bhavaṃ jāneyya, samaṇo mahākaccāno brāhmaṇānaṃ mante ekaṃsena apavadati, paṭikkosatī”ti?
sn35.132:11.4: Evaṃ vutte, lohicco brāhmaṇo kupito ahosi anattamano.
sn35.132:11.6: “na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ yohaṃ aññadatthu māṇavakānaṃyeva sutvā samaṇaṃ mahākaccānaṃ akkoseyyaṃ paribhāseyyaṃ.
sn35.132:12.1: Atha kho lohicco brāhmaṇo tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.132:12.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn35.132:12.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho lohicco brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.132:12.5: “āgamaṃsu nu khvidha, bho kaccāna, amhākaṃ sambahulā antevāsikā kaṭṭhahārakā māṇavakā”ti?
sn35.132:12.6: “Āgamaṃsu khvidha te, brāhmaṇa, sambahulā antevāsikā kaṭṭhahārakā māṇavakā”ti.
sn35.132:12.7: “Ahu pana bhoto kaccānassa tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ kocideva kathāsallāpo”ti?
sn35.132:12.8: “Ahu kho me, brāhmaṇa, tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ kocideva kathāsallāpo”ti.
sn35.132:12.9: “Yathā kathaṃ pana bhoto kaccānassa tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo”ti?
sn35.132:12.10: “Evaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo:
sn35.132:14.1: Evaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tehi māṇavakehi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo”ti.
sn35.132:15.1: “‘Aguttadvāro’ti bhavaṃ kaccāno āha.
sn35.132:15.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bho kaccāna, aguttadvāro hotī”ti?
sn35.132:15.3: “Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe adhimuccati, appiyarūpe rūpe byāpajjati, anupaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati, parittacetaso tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:15.8: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya piyarūpe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyarūpe ca dhamme byāpajjati, anupaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati, parittacetaso tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:15.11: Yāvañcidaṃ bhotā kaccānena aguttadvārova samāno aguttadvāroti akkhāto.
sn35.132:16.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bho kaccāna, guttadvāro hotī”ti?
sn35.132:16.3: “Idha, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe nādhimuccati, appiyarūpe rūpe na byāpajjati, upaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati, appamāṇacetaso tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:16.8: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya piyarūpe dhamme nādhimuccati, appiyarūpe dhamme na byāpajjati, upaṭṭhitakāyassati ca viharati, appamāṇacetaso tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
sn35.132:17.2: Yāvañcidaṃ bhotā kaccānena guttadvārova samāno guttadvāroti akkhāto.
sn35.132:17.5: Seyyathāpi, bho kaccāna, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn35.132:17.7: evamevaṃ bhotā kaccānena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn35.132:17.8: Esāhaṃ, bho kaccāna, taṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn35.132:17.9: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ kaccāno dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ.
sn35.132:17.10: Yathā ca bhavaṃ kaccāno makkarakate upāsakakulāni upasaṅkamati;
sn35.132:17.12: Tattha ye māṇavakā vā māṇavikā vā bhavantaṃ kaccānaṃ abhivādessanti paccuṭṭhissanti āsanaṃ vā udakaṃ vā dassanti, tesaṃ taṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
